positions.title: Contract Web Developer
details: Translated APIs into data-driven Wordpress sites based on Bedrock and Timber
Created charts, graphs, and infographics with CSS alone
Assisted clients in data cleaning and verification
Standardized external data into Wordpress databases
Set up Gulp workflows to speed production

positions.title: Digital Projects Coordinator
details: Took lead on corporate intiative to overhaul workflow processes
Chaired stakeholder meetings, workflow rehearsals, and managed communications
Developed cross-promotion media strategies
Wrote and illustrated documentation for Drupal, Wordpress, and Office 365 applications for non-technical staff
Worked one-on-one with scholars to create data visualizations for their studies
Redesigned communication channels for improved performance
Ensured all properties met responsive web design standards
Maintained DNS accounts and security certificates
Served as a helpful guide to anyone confused and always lending a helping hand

positions.title: Volunteer Web Developer
details: Took lead in redesigning the website of a nonprofit devoted to helping children in Africa
Redesigned the website within the ZURB Foundation framework to make it responsive and work across all devices
Helped client clarify their goals and objectives through careful questioning
Ran content audits and worked with graphic designers to update the organization's branding.

positions.title: Contract Web Developer
details: Built responsive page templates for a legacy website, matching current themes
Developed JavaScript code to match web page backgrounds to image color palettes
Created responsive HTML email templates, both with and without RSS integration
Sought out new technologies and techniques to study and apply

positions.title: Frontend Web Developer
details: Updated legacy client websites to current coding standards
Consulted clients on best strategy to deploy digital properties
Created Wordpress page templates to customize themes
Developed Nationbuilder properties for candidates and nonprofits to expand their reach
Write documentation to help clients get the most out of their websites
Set up Google Analytics to track visitors and advertising
Grew clients social media properties on Twitter, Facebook, and Google+

positions.title: Social Media Associate
details: Grew CEI's following on Twitter and Facebook by 11% and 24%, respectively, in 4 months
Developed new methods to promote CEI's message of free markets and limited government
Wrote a social media strategy for Institute leadership to implement in the coming year
Created new connections with bloggers and others in social media
Scheduled interviews, radio bookings, and media appearances for scholars
Indexed and collected all media clips

positions.title: Consultant, Internal Communications
details: Oversaw the production of Freddie Mac's employee news website, HomeFront
Coordinated writers, designers, and web staff to deliver valuable information to Freddie Mac employees
Wrote, edited, and distributed the daily morning newsletter, FreddieConnections, sent to over 6000 employees
Maintained the department's stock of DSLR cameras
Took photographs of company employees and guests at important events
Received employee questions and ensured they were answered promptly
Created and maintained Freddie Mac's Wall of Fame
